name: Parking Madness
description:
Realistic parking experience with Parking Madness.
Car enthusiasts will be sucked into this addictive game which comes with 75 levels and 3 different vehicles.
The realistic steering feature is the highlight of this game which offers 3 different themes and cars.

Game Features
- Touch-operated steering wheel control.
- Motion censor for an enhanced driving experience.
- Car park, Go-Kart, Forklift - 3 themes
- 75 levels
- 3 vehicles.
- Various locations and difficulty levels.
- Realistic 3D graphics
publishers: Mobil Interaktif Bilisim Hizmetleri Anonim Sirketi
